tag_list: prakhar, bindal, iim-calcutta, iim, bits-pilani, bits, prakhar-bindal, axsiom, axiom, indus-domains, hecc, domains, domainer, domain, broker
overview:
Prakhar Bindal is a domain-names investor and broker, and the CEO of Axsiom, India’s first private open-ended alternative investment vehicle exclusively invested in Internet Domain Names and Early Stage Campus Startups.

Prakhar loves number crunching, and was one of the all-India toppers of IIM-CAT 2009. Prior to Axsiom, he worked in the Financial Research group at D. E. Shaw. A gadget freak and an avid chess player, Prakhar enjoys collecting matchbox labels and reading business fiction.
